K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:1b-1: a'arya ratna me gha na ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:1b-3: 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:1b-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2a-0: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus @2a #//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2a-2: bcom ldan 'das yul g-yan ga ya mgo'i ri la dge slong bdun khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2a-3: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2a-5: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2a-6: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2a-7: shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba; cang shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2a-12: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2a-13: srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2a-14: bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-0: @2b sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-1: chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-4: bkur sti thams cad dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-5: legs par rab tu byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-6: legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-7: brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-8: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-9: gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-11: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-12: thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-13: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-14: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:2b-15: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-0: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la @3a #//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-2: chags pa med pa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-3: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-4: mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-5: lam gyi rgyun ma btsad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-8: kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-10: snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-12: stong pa nyid spyod yul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-13: mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-14: smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-15: sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-16: sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-18: sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3a-19: sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-0: sems @3b ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar mi sgul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-1: sems padmo ltar ma gos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-2: sems rin po che ltar shin tu yongs su dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-3: sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba rnams la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-5: lag na rdo rje rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-6: lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-7: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-8: gtsug na rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-9: rin po che brtsegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-11: rin po che'i rtse mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-12: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-15: rin po che'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-18: dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-20: ye shes kyi snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-22: ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-24: rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-26: spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-31: dri ma med pa'i mig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-35: kun tu spyod pa'i blo gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:3b-36: ye shes kyi blo gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-2: sengge'i rnam par rol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-3: sgra chen po dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-5: sgra dbyangs brjod pa zab mo sgrog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-17: bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-18: byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-19: rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-20: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-21: lha'i bu shin tu gnod bral la sogs pa gnod bral gyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-22: lha'i bu kun tu dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-23: lha'i bu shin tu 'phrul dga' la sogs la 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4a-24: lha'i bu dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-0: ded dpon la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi bdud kyi bu @4b rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-1: tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-2: lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-3: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags pa bzang ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-6: de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-7: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang gzi can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-11: de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-12: dpal gyi gzi brjid la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po'i khye'u brgya ston du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-13: klu'i bu mo mang po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-14: de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-21: lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dag dang yang thabs cig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-22: yang de'i tshe ga ya na ga ya mgo'i ri'i dpag tshad bzhi kho ra khor yug tu skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam yang gang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-31: mi ma yin pa dag gis ma gang bar gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:4b-32: bar snang gi phyogs de med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-0: 'khor de lta bu 'dus shing 'khod pa'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das kyi sengge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad @5a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-2: kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad phyed pa la lha'i ras bcos bu du ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-4: rin po che'i dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-6: dar gyi lda ldi brgya stong du ma ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-10: sengge'i khri da'i kho ra khor yug gi sa'i phyogs de'i nges rdo rje la yid du 'ong zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-11: chag chag legs par btab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-12: phyag dar legs par byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-13: dri rab tu zhim zhing lha'i me tog brgya stong du mas gtor bar gyur to; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir phyogs de na gser gyi padma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-14: 'dab ma brgya stong du ma yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-21: dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong la reg na dga' bar 'gyur ba dag skyes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-22: sengge'i khri de'i gra bzhir ha cang yang mi ring /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-23: ha cang yang mi nye ba nas rin po che'i shing srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-24: sboms su rgyang grags gnyis kyis 'khor ba bzhi skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-25: sengge'i khri legs par bshams pa de la bcom ldan 'das blo ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-29: bdud dang phyir rgol ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5a-31: 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-0: ma @5b gos la mi bsnyengs shing mi 'dzem ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-1: sengge'i ltar bag tsha ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-2: mtsho dang 'dra bar dang ste rnyog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dvang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-3: rgya mtsho ltar zab cing gting dpag bka' la rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-4: ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-5: nyi ma ltar rab tu lhan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-6: zla ba ltar rab tu sim pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-7: klu chen po ltar chos kyi char mngon par 'babs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-8: tshangs pa chen po ltar 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-9: slob ma shin tu dul ba'i tshogs mtha' yas pa'i 'khor mnga' ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-12: 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis zhal du bltas shing ma khengs ma dud par bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-13: 'khor tshogs pa de na lam me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-16: bcom ldan 'das de ltar lam me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-18: lhang nge ba'i dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas 'od zer kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:5b-19: de byung bas phyogs bcu thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad snang bar byas te phyir 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsum par yang mi mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-2: zla ba'i 'od nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi gseb phye ba'am btsum par mi mngon pa de bzhin du de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsum par mi mngon no /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-5: bye ma'i phung po la mar ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-7: chu zhugs na mi mngon pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-8: de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang phye ba'am btsum par mi mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-9: de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na padma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na padma'i spyan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-12: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-13: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-15: theg pa gcig las brtsams nas chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6a-18: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs par bud med @6b dang; mngal na gnas te 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgra'ang mi grag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams de na bza' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-4: zas kyi bya ba'ang mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-5: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-6: ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-7: chos kyi dga' ba'i zas can no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyur ba ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams de na zla ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-11: skar ma rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa las 'jig rten gyi khams de na rtsva dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-16: ri la sogs pa'ang mi snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:6b-17: 'jig rten gyi khams de 'dra ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba zhig gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7a-0: de 'od des reg ste bskul nas rang gi gnas nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i spyan de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom @7a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7a-1: ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te padma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7a-2: de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang 'od des reg ste bskul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7a-3: rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i spyan ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7a-4: padma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga padma'i snying po la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i spyan ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7a-7: 'di lta bu'i 'od bzang po dri ma ma mchis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7a-10: lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar bgyid pa byung ba 'di su'i mthu lags zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7a-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-0: nub phyogs @7b na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyod 'das pa na mi mjed ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-1: de na sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-4: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-5: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-7: des 'od bzang po dri ma med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-10: lus dang sems shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa 'di phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-11: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-12: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i spyan de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-14: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:7b-16: de skad ces gsol pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8a-19: bcom ldan 'das; de ci'i slad du phyir mi ldog pa ma lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8a-20: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8a-23: phyir mi ldog pa'ang yin la /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-5: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos las sems can de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes pa mthong nas sems can de dag phyir mi ldog par lung ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-8: mtshan thos pa de kho nas de ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-11: don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-15: shing la la'i sa bon gyi rnam pa zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-16: sa bon de la sa bon gyi nyes pa thams cad med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-17: myu gu skye ba nas rdzogs pa'i bar du rkyen rnams yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-19: sa bon de la ji skad ces bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-22: nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-24: yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'o; ;bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-27: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:8b-28: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9a-3: bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9a-4: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9a-9: mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9a-12: rigs kyi bu; de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song zhig /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-1: mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-2: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i spyan des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams der bag yod par gnas pas gnas par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-8: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-16: chos ma yin pa 'dod pa mang ba /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-28: nyon mongs pa du mas nye bar nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-29: sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-30: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-32: gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:9b-34: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-3: gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-6: gang de lta bur kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dge ba'i sems gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dka' ba byed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-8: gang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can yongs su dag pa yod pa lta ci ngo mtshar gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-9: gang dag de ltar kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang dad pa rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-10: se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-11: chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-12: dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-13: se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ste spyod pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-15: de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems yang dag par bzung ste gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10a-17: de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa srid du'ang snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10b-1: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10b-6: de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das de las 'di lta bu mthun pa'i rjes su bstan pa 'di mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te rang rang gi gnas nas dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10b-7: dong nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la mchod pa'i phyir la las ni; rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10b-9: chu dang zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon par sprul /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:10b-37: sil snyan gyi sprin rnams mngon par sprul to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11a-1: par sprul nas gcig tu 'dus te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang lhan cig tu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11a-4: mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11a-6: gang gis sems can de dag thams cad bde ba mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba legs par mngon par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11a-7: byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyis legs so zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ltar mnyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i lus las 'od dang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11a-12: lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11a-13: 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab cing snang bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-0: gang stong gsum gyi stong chen @11b po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-1: byol song gi skye gnas pa'i lus su gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-2: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus su gnas pa de dag 'od des reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-3: bde zhing khro ba dang gnod sems dang yang bral te phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-4: gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar mun pa mun nag gang du nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-5: zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-6: 'di ltar mthu che ba; 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag gis kyang lam me /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-8: lhang nger ma gyur pa de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-9: gang der skyes pa'i sems can dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-10: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gang khor yug gi ri rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-11: khor yug gi ri chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-13: ri btang bzung chen po rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-14: de ma yin pa'i ri nag po gzhan de dag kyang 'od des khyab ste snang bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:11b-15: blar ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-0: 'og tu mnar med pa'i sems can chen po yan chad de'i bar du gang 'od des snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon @12a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-1: par bya ba mngon par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-2: de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gdag gis kyang ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas zas 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-23: bde bar btsas pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-24: de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba der nye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-25: skyes bu dam pa de dag nye bar gyur ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i dra bas khebs bar kun tu snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-26: steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i padma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-27: lha'i me tog gi sprin rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-28: lha'i shing tog gi sprin rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-29: lha'i phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-30: lha'i spos kyi sprin rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12a-31: lha'i gos kyi sprin rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-0: lha'i @12b phye ma'i sprin rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-4: ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par rab tu phab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-5: de dag mngon par rab tu phab pas sems can gang la reg pa de dag thams cad rab tu bde bar gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-6: yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri la shing tha mal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-7: sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang med par gyur par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-8: sa phyogs de dag rin po che'i shing rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-9: dpag bsam gyi shing rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-10: me tog gi shing rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-13: aa ga ru'i shing rnams kun tu snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-14: de dag kun tu bzang por 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-15: bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dag kyang sgra 'byin cing sil snyan de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-16: lumbi'i tshal rab mchog tu gang skyes pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-17: mnyam med gzhar yang nyon mongs dbang mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-18: nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-19: ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-20: byang chub mchog sus byang chub shing dbang drung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-21: bdud kyi sde stobs bcom nas sangs rgyas pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-22: dri med gzi ldan de la phyag 'tshal du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-23: ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:12b-24: chos tshul 'di dag sgyu ma smig rgyu dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-2: bsod nams zhing rab de la phyag 'tshal du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-3: ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-4: chos rnams sna tshogs 'ja' dang 'dra ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-5: gar mkhan tshon 'drar gang gis rab rtogs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-6: mi g-yo bsod nams gter la phyag 'tshal du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-7: ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-8: gang gis bskal pa brgya phrag mang por ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-9: thugs rje'i thugs kyi tshogs kun rdzogs mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-10: dri med zla zhal de la phyag 'tshal du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-11: ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-12: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-13: lha yi tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-14: gti mug mun bral de la phyag 'tshal du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-15: ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-16: gang gis mchog gi chos kyi gter brnyes shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-17: thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dag la btang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-18: mnyam med phan mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-19: ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags; ;gang zhig thugs zhi rtag par byams pa'i yid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-20: padma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-21: yon tan mchog rab mnga' la phyag 'tshal du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-22: ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-23: mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i sku //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13a-24: dpe byad bzang po'i 'bru chags 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba gang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13b-0: yal ga mtha' yas rin chen shing @13b la phyag 'tshal du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13b-1: bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13b-2: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag tu de nas tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13b-5: sngon ma mthong ba'i snga ltas gda' ba 'di dag su'i lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13b-6: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13b-9: shar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams padma can zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13b-10: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padma'i spyan zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:13b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:14a-0: de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang skyes @14a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:38a-17: sdug bsngal lo snyam nas btang snyoms la gnas pa yin /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:39a-0: de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang @39a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:70a-16: de la rgya mtsho ltar ni /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:70b-30: yongs su brtag pa bzung ste phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la de lta bu'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de bsdoms pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71a-0: 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan @71a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71a-2: rnam grangs des shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71a-3: de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed cig 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71a-4: snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa dag na sems can yod do cog ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stag dang so sor ldan par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71a-5: de bzhin du bgrang ba de snyed kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag tu gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71a-6: phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang brgya byin gcig cig ldan par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71a-7: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas ba nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag tu gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-0: bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad @71b tshangs pa chen por gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-1: bsod nams de thams cad gcig tu bsdoms pa dang tshangs pa chen po gcig cig ldan par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-2: tshangs pa chen po ji ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-3: snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-6: 'od zer gyi sbrin chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-7: dbang bcu thob pa sha stag tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-9: de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-10: nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa'i dus gsum pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su gtogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-12: rdul phra rab brgyar bsgyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba sbu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-14: ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-15: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu las dpe byad bzang po re re mngon par 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-16: dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:71b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu zla ba nya ste dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72a-3: de'ang brjod du med pa stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing bltar mi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72a-5: de'ang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug cu pa dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha' yas par 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad bsam pa yongs su sim par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ces bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72a-12: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas par byed pa bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72a-14: yongs su brtag pa bzung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-0: gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos @72b gyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sa bcu pa chos kyi sbrin la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-1: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-4: dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la dzambu chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i snod rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa nam mkha'i tshad tsam gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs su bkang zhing skad cig skad cig tu blangs shing khyer yang ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gang ba'am 'bri bar mi mngon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-7: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya'i mtshan ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-9: de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-11: byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-22: sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-25: de la byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:72b-26: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-1: thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-2: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-6: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang khyad zhugs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-7: rnam pa thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-9: yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-10: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-11: sgrib pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig re re la 'gro zhing 'ong na dri zhim po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-13: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'byung ba'i padmas rkang pa yongs su brtan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-14: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-15: chos thams cad shin tu rnam par non pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgoms pas thogs pa med cing yid du 'ong ba'i dmigs pa'i mtshan ma chen po bcu la sogs pa grangs med pa'i ltas bzang po mthong ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73a-17: phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu med pa'i rgyan byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa snyed kyi bdag @73b gi gzugs brnyan gyis dbang bskur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-1: yang dag par non pa'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'i char gyi snang ba'i sgo dpag tu med pa thams cad gtan pa med par kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mchod sbyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-4: blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad mi mthun pa med cing don yod par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g-yo bar byed cing 'gro ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-6: ngan 'gro la sogs pa las sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-7: mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-12: rig pa grangs med pas rnam par rol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-13: chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med par phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-14: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i sgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:73b-15: gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar phyin pa'i bsod nams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-0: ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrubs par grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa @74a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-1: chen po'i yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu 'thob par gang gnas pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa'o; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-5: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-9: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni; 'das pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-12: don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-14: sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'od ni; mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-15: kun tu shin tu lta ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-16: sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-17: de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-27: nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-28: don thams cad grub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-30: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-31: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74a-32: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-6: sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-7: mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-12: chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-13: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-14: sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-15: kha dog mtha' yas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-16: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gzungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-17: de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-24: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-25: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-26: rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-27: gang zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-33: tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs med pa dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-34: ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:74b-35: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob pa ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-0: dus ji bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa @75a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-1: ston pas las la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su gang ba ston pas mos pa la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-4: dus dang zhing gang du 'dod pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pa'i smon lam la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-6: chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pas chos la dbang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-9: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-13: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-14: dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdzul shin tu phra ba'i grangs la sogs pa skad cig gcig la yongs su shes pa rnams thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa smon pas ye shes la dbang ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-17: de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75a-20: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-6: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i stobs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-9: de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-11: gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-12: bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyi spyod lam smad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i srung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-13: chos bzung ba yun du mi brjed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-14: thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-15: dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-16: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-17: sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-20: de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-22: ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-23: ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:75b-24: ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-2: ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-3: ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-4: bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad sdud pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-5: yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-6: thabs la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gis theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-7: theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-8: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-9: zung dang snrel gzhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-10: ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon par 'phags pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-13: yid kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-14: sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:76a-15: 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' bar ston pa rnams dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:154a-26: sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos nas dga' ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:154b-3: las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:154b-5: su dag thos nas 'dzin pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-6: de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang na lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-7: lha mo 'dis ji srid cig nas chos kyis rnam grangs 'di thos nas de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang 'di bud med kyi lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-9: lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-11: de ltar lha mo mi 'chi ba 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba thob la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed du mang pa zhig bsnyen bkur bgyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-13: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis bud med kyi lus las ma bsgyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-16: 'di la sems can gyi don ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176a-23: rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-3: lha mo mi 'chi bas yang dag par len du btsud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-5: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-6: brang ba las 'das pa zhig ngas mngon par shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-14: bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-15: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mi 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo mi 'chi ba la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-18: khyod kyis rang ccig sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-19: de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-20: lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil lta bur mnyam zhing bee d'urya'i gzhir snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:176b-21: ri nag po med cing shing tha mal pa med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-1: dag na yang dpag bsam gyi shing sha stag snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-2: gnas gnas dag na chu mig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-5: rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba dag snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-6: mi phal pa med par snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-7: de na bud med kyi sgra'ang mi grag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-8: gnas dang gnas dag na padma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam dag snang bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-9: padma de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung du 'khod pa sha stag snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'chi ba de'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-13: jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig rbgya stong du mas mdun du bdar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-14: 'di ltar chos nyid 'di kho na brtsams nas chos ston par snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-15: de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba'ang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177a-16: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g-yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas @177b 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-3: rigs kyi bu mo gnag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snyan tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-9: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-10: de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-13: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin pa lhug par byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-14: de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa brgya stong mang por byin pa bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-16: rigs kyi bu mo gnag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-17: legs par zhus te sems dad pas sems can dad pa la byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-18: de bas kyang 'di bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-21: zang zing gi sbyin pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-27: 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyis zang zing ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-28: rnam par du mar myong gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:177b-29: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ro ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-0: gnag la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la bkod @178a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-1: pa bas; gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-6: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-7: de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-10: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-13: gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-16: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la bkod pa bas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-21: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-22: de bas 'di bsod nams ched mang du skyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-27: rang sangs rgyas rnams snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-28: chos 'di nyid la brten na byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-29: chos 'di nyid la brten na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-31: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178a-34: kha ton byas pas mdo sde thams cad bzung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-0: chos thams cad kyi ma mo @178b ste; rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-1: chos nyid 'di ma thob par chos nyid rgya chen po 'thob par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-5: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-7: bdag cag gis kyang chos nyid 'di thob pas skye ba'i 'khor ba chen po bas par bgyis so /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-12: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-13: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po dag la bka' stsal pa; rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-14: sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-15: ston pa'i sa'i phyogs de byang chub sems kyi snying por gzung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-16: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gzung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-17: mchod rten chen por gzung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-18: bdag cag gi ston pa gnas 'di na bzhugs par gzung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:178b-24: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-1: pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-2: sa phyogs gang na chos smra ba de gnas pa de la'ang mchod rten du 'du shes bskyed par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-3: chos smra ba de la'ang bla mar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-4: dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-5: lam ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-6: chos smra ba de mthong na dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-9: rim gror byas te stan la bdar bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-10: chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-12: zhes brjod pa mang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-15: bskal pa las lhag par chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa brjod kyang chos smra ba de la cung zad kyang phan par byas pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-22: gyi na cung zad du zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-24: gal te chos 'di 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos smra ba de 'ong ba'i lam bdag gi khrag gis chag chag byas na yang chos smra ba de la phan pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul gzung ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-0: chos smra ba des kyang chos @179b kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-2: yang dag par ston pa'i tshe 'jigs pa med par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-6: gos gtsang ma bgos te dad pa bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-7: bdag gi bsngags pa brjod kyang mi snyems pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-8: nga rgyal du mi gzung bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-11: des zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ri mor byas te chos bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-14: dog sa'i phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-15: bstan par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-16: chos smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag dpung dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-22: khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-24: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su bsrung bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-27: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:179b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-0: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dkon mchog @180a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-1: sprin ces bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-2: yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-3: ye shes sgron ma zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-4: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas kun dris pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba yid dga' zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-7: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-8: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-13: gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu la sogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-14: lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-15: de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-22: lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-23: 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so;;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-24: /lo tstsha ba bandhe rin chen mtsho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-064-001:180a-25: chos nyid tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
